casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

Septembeb, 1950.

(September 21, 1950.) Bell Aircraft Corporation, Plaintiff, v. Robert Siegler, Jr., Individually and as President of Local Union 501, United Automobile, Aircraft and Agricultural Implement Workers of America, C. I. O. (United Auto Workers), et al., Defendants. In the Matter of Bell Aircraft Corporation, Respondent, against Robert Siegler, Jr., Individually and as President of Local Union 503, United Automobile, Aircraft and Agricultural Implement Workers of America, C. I. O. (United Auto Workers), et al., Appellants. (Contempt Proceeding No. 2.)

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. Motion for a stay of all proceedings on the part of the plaintiff pending the hearing and determination of the appeal by the Court of Appeals granted. Present — Taylor, P. J., McCurn, Love, Kimball and Piper, JJ. [See ante, p. 943.]
